title: Ep 445 | Phil & Allie Beth Stuckey Discuss Americaâ€™s Love Problem & Weaponized Empathy
description:
Phil is excited to sit down with BlazeTV host Allie Beth Stuckey to dive into topics like America's love problem, confusing and weaponized empathy, and the political and religious division running wild in our country. Zach Dasher takes a look at obstacles to intimacy, such as social media usage and face masks. Allie calls the churches in America that are willing to compromise to fit in with the culture one of her greatest concerns. Phil reminds us that it's not about Left vs. Right, but about mankind hoping the government will fix the broken world instead of loving God and loving your neighbor.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed
